CustomField.formula:
IF (ISPICKVAL(Investment_Vehicle__r.Platform__c, 'Property'), HYPERLINK("https://na27.salesforce.com/" & Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Primary_Lead__r.Id, Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Primary_Lead__r.FirstName + ' ' + Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Primary_Lead__r.LastName, "_self"),
IF (ISPICKVAL(Investment_Vehicle__r.Platform__c, 'Private Equity'), HYPERLINK("https://na27.salesforce.com/" & Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Secondary_Lead__r.Id, Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Secondary_Lead__r.FirstName + ' ' + Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Secondary_Lead__r.LastName, "_self"),
IF(OR ((NOT(ISPICKVAL(Investment_Vehicle__r.Platform__c, 'Private Equity'))),
(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Investment_Vehicle__r.Platform__c, 'Property')))),
HYPERLINK("https://na27.salesforce.com/" & Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Real_Asset_Lead__r.Id , Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Real_Asset_Lead__r.FirstName + ' ' + Consultant__r.PFG_CRM_Real_Asset_Lead__r.LastName, "_self"), '')))
CustomField.label: Platform Consultant CRM
